named-query.name: findAuthorizationByUser
named-query.query: select rua from RoleUserAuthorization rua where rua.user=:user and rua.abolishDate>:abolishDate

named-query.name: findUserAuthorizationByRole
named-query.query: select auth from RoleUserAuthorization auth where auth.role.id=:roleId and auth.abolishDate>:abolishDate
